text:
THIS is why we do it! To help people who need it the most. 
We received this photo & thanks from a couple who our volunteers were able to schedule *together* for their #COVIDVaccine today @GilletteStadium. (I'm not crying, you're crying😢💓) #COVID19 #Covid_19 #Boston #vaccine https://t.co/rzi570Pwtd https://t.co/48UKaHRV6W
